ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You need a Polar Bear Skin, they are white in colour. You can get them from Polar Bear Cubs as well. Give one skin and 5 plat to Karg, he will give you a
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----

: From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
:
: About the cloaks...what kind of skin/pelt do you need to turn in and what
: kind or critter drops them most often? I'm guessing Polar Bears do but we
: all know that EQ doesn't need to make sense all the time :).

You need a Polar Bear Skin, they are white in colour. You can get them from
Polar Bear Cubs as well. Give one skin and 5 plat to Karg, he will give you
a Cloak. Be SURE you hail Karg before turning in each plat/skin combo, as if
he starts moving during the trade you will lose your items.

: and...does anyone know how much these skins/pelts go for if I were to go
: there and auction to buy them (save on hunting time).

You can buy them from merchants (if someone has sold them) for less than 3
gp.

: Well, not exactly...whenever they patch or server goes down for some
reason
: the merchant inventory is reset so all those bat wings get super glued
back
: onto rats to make more bats I guess. Well, at anyrate I'm guessing that
the
: selling bat wings would work right after a new patch and for a few days
: after that.

The merchants I'm referring to sell bat wings for 14 copper all the time,
they always have them in stock.
